title: Le Corbusier, Notre Dame du Haut--identify artist

content.prompt: The architect of the building on the right is Frank Lloyd Wright. The architect of the building on the left is

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
